Description:
Meticulous renovation on 650m2 (approx.).
Renovated to a meticulous standard, this home upon 650m2 (approx.) extends many positives to any first-home buyer, investor & all buyers alike.
Upon entry, you're greeted by the beautifully polished floorboards, taking you to the renovated, open kitchen & dining area with 40mm stone benchtops, dishwasher & stainless steel oven & stove, the living area, blending some unique character & bounds of natural light, the three bedrooms with robes, central bathroom & laundry with access to the second toilet, all serviced by ducted heating.
Overlooked from the dining areas full length sliding doors is the tranquil rear yard with its own alfresco area, plenty of shedding & multi-car garages with additional space for entertaining or a workshop. The front yard conveniences you with an abundance of off-street parking.
You're located nearby to many major amenities including Leopold Primary School, Gateway Plaza, Ash Road shops, parks & reserves & easily accessible to the Geelong CBD & Bellarine Peninsula.

Description:
Everything Youve Wished For
This property has been neatly maintained and offers comfortable living for a first home buyer, young family or an opportunity to secure the perfect investment property. The instant comfort and appeal of this home, complimented by its superbly central location, will ensure this residence is a talking point amongst buyers.
Set on a large allotment of 906m2, this well-maintained family home has so much to offer. Comprising four spacious bedrooms, main offering a private ensuite and ample robe space, while remaining bedrooms utilise the spacious central bathroom. The convenient layout of this floorplan incorporates the open plan kitchen, dining and living zone at the hub of the home. The character kitchen includes dishwasher, gas cooktop, oven, and an abundance of storage space. Furthermore, the two sperate living zones provide extra space for the whole family to relax and enjoy.
Completing this ideal property is the enormous, paved undercover entertaining area with built in outdoor kitchen. As far as alfrescos go, this is certainly impressive, perfect for enjoying a summer BBQ with family and friends. The rear yard also offers a large 5m x 6.5m second shed/ workshop, a smaller garden shed for extra storage and veggie patch area. The lush lawn and abundance of yard space is waiting to be enjoyed by all, as well as the low maintenance border garden being both pretty and practical.
Added features include gas ducted heating throughout, ceiling fans, double remote garage with drive through access, undercover front carport for extra car accommodation and multiple water tanks.
This home simply caters for everyone! Sure to please both investment buyers and those looking for a new family residence, this property is every bit as good as it looks from the street. Within extremely close proximity to Leopold Primary school, Gateway Plaza, walking tracks, parks and bike trails. Public transport only a stones throw away and moments from some of the best beaches the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. Whether you are going to live in, renovate or invest, don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity!

Description:
Clifton Springs Best Value for Money!
Set at the top of the court behind a private gate the establish garden lines the path to the picturesque front entrance. Light timber boards throughout, elevated living, plenty of windows and natural light make this home an absolute delight. A very generous living area that combines into the reading nook offers subtle bay views, complete with split system heating/cooling and ceiling fan before flowing into the kitchen and dining. An updated kitchen with new cabinetry, 900mm freestanding gas Omega stove/oven and dishwasher overlooking the dining. The rear of the home hosts 3 bedrooms all with built-in robes, the master with a walk-in robe and ensuite. A main bathroom, separate toilet and laundry complete this tidy package.
The HIGHLIGHT of this home is the astounding block size, a whopping 780m2 surrounded by established gardens with plenty of room for additions and improvements, complete with a double lock up garage.
Fantastically positioned, close to public transport, schools and all your major amenities all within proximity to the Bay. The ideal first home, investment or something with just enough of a blank canvas to add your creative improvements, value for money is certainly evident with what is on offer. If you want a slice of the Bellarine's best kept secret be sure to have this home at the top of your list.

Address: 104 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Savvy, Entry Level Buying!
Your piece of the Bellarine pie is up for the taking! Options are in abundance whether you're looking for your foot in the property door with your first home, a rewarding investment, perfect downsizer or a lock up and leave holiday home, this will tick all boxes. The ultimate location, as a 15 minute stroll has you dipping your toes in at the beach, public transport on your door step and all major amenities at your fingertips.
A private picket fence with secure gates welcomes you to the established and manicured front gardens. The sense of home is immanent, as you're greeted by an open first living area. A fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and generous walk-in-pantry overlook a meals area, which seamlessly flows onto an expansive and funky 2nd living/rumpus area. 3 bedrooms fall from the central hallway, all with built-in-robes, the master with en-suite, with this wing also comprising a central family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry with an abundance of storage and outdoor access.
The full length driveway leads to a secure double lock up carport at the rear, which allows ample room for multiple cars, caravans, boats and all toys in between to be safety stored.
Additional features include: 3 split systems, subtle Bay views, garden shed, undercover patio, low maintenance courtyard, new front security, awnings on all front windows and electric roller blinds from the 2nd living area windows.
An inspection is a must to appreciate this well-kept, low maintenance and cosy humble home.

Description:
Delightful lifestyle With Idyllic Surroundings
At the southern end of Drysdale, this neat contemporary home offers an ideal lifestyle for first home buyers, a small family, or someone looking to downsize. Located just a short stroll away from Lorne Lake Reserve and the historic Drysdale station and rail line, there's lots of natural wildlife to discover, and picnic spots by the dozen.
With an elevated driveway to a double garage, a central entrance opens to a tiled passage with the master bedroom and ensuite sitting adjacent. A linen press and Euro-style laundry behind double cupboard doors also occupy the passage.
A bright open-plan kitchen/dining/lounge area reveals itself with a sliding door to a covered, north-facing patio where barbecues and alfresco entertainment are a natural. The kitchen boasts an electric oven with a 4-burner gas cooktop, plus a dishwasher built into the island bench/breakfast bar.
Two more bedrooms share a second bathroom with shower, bath, and vanity - plus a separate WC. Front and rear gardens are well established and feature low-maintenance yukkas, succulents, and native grasses. There are ceiling fans throughout, plus a split system in the lounge - providing year-round comfort.
- Contemporary family home in quiet Drysdale street
- Three bedrooms - master with ensuite and dressing room
- Main bathroom with shower, bath, vanity - separate WC
- Open-plan kitchen/dining/lounge to covered alfresco patio
- Euro-style laundry, double garage, low-maintenance garden
- Split system and ceiling fans for year-round comfort.

Description:
HISTORICAL HOMESTEAD, BEAUTIFULLY RENOVATED!
A unique opportunity to buy a period gem on approx. 1230 SQM and within walking distance of the Drysdale village, parks, schools and the Rail Trail. The open plan living area is spacious with large well designed kitchen, dining, and french doors open to the long verandah. The second lounge room looks out over the mature gardens with doors opening to numerous entertaining areas. Dine in style or just relax in the hammock. 4 bedrooms, master with extra large WIR and ensuite, two more bathrooms, study and fantastic laundry. Other outstanding features include timber floors, fireplace, three split systems, pantry, dishwasher, water tank, loads of storage and so much more to see. The matured garden is fantastic with so many areas to relax for hours, even room for a cricket match. The triple garage is huge. Cars, caravan, boat, and workshop all under one roof with three way entry, and high easy access. A wonderful chance to live in style, layered with history. Maybe do a B&B (second access),or develop (STCA). Ring for an appointment.

Description:
Embrace Country Style Living in Leopold!
Occupying approx. 2 acres, this property offers a rare opportunity in the ever-popular Leopold! Where else can you enjoy the charms of country living while also being a short stroll from an expansive shopping centre?
With the Gateway Plaza less than 500 metres away, youll love that an abundance of shopping and dining options are right at your fingertips. The Gateway Sanctuary is also a short stroll from your front door, along with public transport and the Leopold Memorial Reserve sporting grounds. Families will appreciate easy access to Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub, and the Leopold Library. The Bellarine Highway grants easy access to the delights of Geelong and the scenic Bellarine Peninsula.
Home to lush lawn and established gums, the rear paddock provides a tranquil outlook and is ideal for hobby farmers or those who simply enjoy having a bit more space. Buyers and developers will also see the appeal in sub-dividing the land (STCA).
Its easy to see that this one-owner home has been loved over the years, with the original interiors granting you the option to move straight in or to refresh with your own personal touch (STCA). Overlooking the front garden and graced with an open fireplace, the generous lounge entices you to sit back and relax. The living/dining zone flows onto the spacious outdoor entertaining area, which sets the scene for many casual gatherings or fun-filled parties that stretch long into the night! With grapevines creating a picturesque canopy, this outdoor zone is simply charming. The enclosed spa area is sure to delight both children and adults alike!
The kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry and appliances (dishwasher, wall oven, gas hob, rangehood).
Graced with a bay window, the Master Bedroom is complete with a walk-in robe and en suite. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes (one with direct access to the spa area) share close access to the main bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry.
A gas wall heater, air conditioner, and ceiling fans provide modern comfort.
Auction terms: 10% deposit, balance 90/120 days.

Description:
BRAND NEW NEAR THE WATER
Here is a rare opportunity to secure a brand new home in an established area within easy walking distance to the bayside beaches and nearby parklands. The new shopping centre is just a short drive away and further afield are the fabulous attractions of the Bellarine.
With 3 generously sized bedrooms, main with WIR, and a north facing living area and back yard you can enjoy a relaxed life by the bay in this well designed home. The living area opens out to a timber deck and landscaped garden. The family kitchen features stone benchtops, pantry, 900mm s/s cooker, and a s/s dishwasher. The living area features floorboards and carpets to the bedrooms.
There is ample storage and a large garage with remote opening with direct access to keep you and your car secure. For your comfort the 6-star home has ducted heating external wall and ceiling insulation batts, and a 6 Star Energy rating.
The home is fully landscaped with paved driveway and ready to move in and enjoy.
This home will appeal to 1st homebuyers, those looking to downsize and investors looking for an investment with depreciation benefits.

Description:
A Private Light-filled Haven With Stunning Courtyard Appeal
Parkland living at its finest, this modern well designed four bedroom and two bathroom home is nestled beside the landscaped Sundial Reserve.
Live the quiet life in the heart of Clifton Springs with a spectacular outlook.
This fantastic home has that charming appeal that everyone who sees it will feel at home.
The home comprises of a formal lounge or dining room with an open plan living area leading to a private undercover alfresco dining or living area.
A contemporary kitchen with dishwasher, gas cook top and range hood, a large island bench top for that added space.
The master bedroom is filled with natural sunlight serviced by a walk in wardrobe and to cap it off is an ensuite fit for royalty with a large walk in shower, toilet and vanity but also a large spa bath which looks out to the private courtyard.
A large central bathroom with shower and vanity services the remaining three bedrooms that are all spacious in size.
The home is kept comfortable all year round with ducted heating and cooling with a separate split system air conditioner for the really hot days.
Room for a boat and caravan with a large double lock up garage.
Fantastic living with a private oasis in your own back yard, 611sqm allotment gives you that space to live in comfort.

Description:
STUNNING PRIVATE RETREAT
Step inside this beautiful property and you will immediately feel at home. Comprising a private front courtyard, 4 bedrooms including 2 with ensuites, designer kitchen and spacious open plan dining and living area leading out to an undercover entertainers deck, this truly is a stunning private retreat situated in close proximity to the Drysdale township with schools, medical clinics, shopping and restaurants all on your doorstep. This home is ideally suited to those who enjoy low maintenance living allowing more time to enjoy all that the beautiful Bellarine has to offer including pristine beaches and award winning wineries. Other features of this fantastic property include ducted heating, split system and a double garage with storage room. An inspection is highly recommended and is sure to impress. Call today!

Description:
Family Living On Half an Acre!
Occupying an impressive 2189m2 (approx.) parcel of land, this home takes spacious family living to a whole new level!
Set in a peaceful pocket of Leopold, you can enjoy living within walking distance to public transport, Leopold Sportsmans Club, and the Bellarine Rail Trail. Easy access to Leopold Primary School and the Leopold Community Hub makes this an ideal location for families, while the nearby Gateway Plaza provides you with all of your shopping and dining needs. Just jump on the Portarlington Highway, and youll soon be in the heart of Geelong or exploring the Bellarine Peninsula.
Its easy to see that this one-owner home has been well-loved over the years. The original interiors are in spotless condition, while the spacious layout offers immense flexibility for growing families.
The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone flows onto the north-facing backyard, while the formal lounge/dining is ideal for hosting loved ones. The updated kitchen features a large walk-in pantry, soft-close drawers, and a breakfast bar. SMEG stainless steel appliances include a dishwasher, 700mm oven/gas hob, and 600mm rangehood.
The rumpus room, complete with a study/5th BR with built-in storage, is extremely versatile. Whether you need a large home office, a teen retreat, or even want to add an en suite to create a downstairs Master Bedroom, this space will effortlessly accommodate (STCA).
The laundry and powder room complete the lower level.
Upstairs, the Master Bedroom boasts elevated views, a large walk-in robe, en suite, and a versatile dressing room/nursery. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes (one with north-facing views towards the You Yangs) share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet.
Two gas heaters and ceiling fans provide comfort. The 2.52KW solar panel system is on the premium 60cent feed-in tariff until 2023 meaning you can benefit both the environment and your bank account!
The expansive backyard creates a wealth of space for children who love to roam and explore. An abundance of fruit trees invite you to enjoy macadamias, almonds, olives, stone fruit, and citrus straight from your very own backyard!
The oversize 8x9m lock-up garage offers plenty of room to set up a workshop, while rear vehicle access is ideal for storing caravans or trailers. Tradies will also see the appeal in constructing a large work shed in the backyard (STCA).
If youve been searching for spacious family living both inside and out, then this home will be at the top of your list! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Auction has started | Current bid $515,000
The Openn Negotiation has started. (Openn Negotiation is an auction that is conducted online and allows flexible terms for qualified buyers) The property can sell at any time.
Open to all buyers, cash buyers, including subject to finance, subject to flexible terms - subject to Vendor approval.
Contact Brock Grainger on 0427 855 157 or Chris Schumann 0411 309 990 immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment.
With everything renovated, remodelled and ready to go, you can simply move in, add your own personal touches and start living. Featuring a contemporary and easy living vibe throughout, this home is great for entertaining indoors and out.
Its highlights include open plan living and dining with polished timber flooring and a near new kitchen; a master suite with walk in robes and en-suite; three additional bedrooms with built in robes; and a fully tiled family sized bathroom with separate shower and designer style freestanding bath. The second living area, towards the rear, is ideally suited as a relaxed space to unwind and to enjoy easy access to the garden and outdoors. Here the entertaining area is undercover and sheltered for year round use. A cedar hot tub, fire pit corner, and low maintenance gardens with established native trees are a welcome bonus; and the 613m2 (approx) allotment is private and fully fenced.
A few of the practical features of this property include a large workshop, garden shed, solar power, gas heating, double carport and plentiful secure off street parking.
Families will love the location with its short walk to the local school and bus routes. Geelong is a quick commute away and all the benefits of the Bellarine are so easily accessible too. Finished to perfection with all the hard work done, this is an obvious opportunity to secure a first class family home or clever investment.

Description:
Rare Lifestyle Opportunity on 1.66 Acres!!
Your dream starts NOW! Boasting an array of opportunities and plenty of room to spread out, this is that once in a lifetime property that you simply can't miss! Centrally and conveniently positioned on the fringe of the ever-growing Leopold, enjoy the very best of rural living, with all amenities just a step away!
The solid 1960's brick veneer family home has been semi refreshed throughout the years, however still has plenty of potential to add your own personal flare. The inviting warmth of polished Tasmanian Oak hardwood floors greet you upon entry and feature throughout the home. The heart of the home offers itself a spacious lounge room, which flows into the sundrenched dining space and open kitchen with electric cooking and ample storage. 4 generous size bedrooms are centrally positioned from a kids retreat area and serviced by a renovated bathroom, equipped with vanity, shower and bath. The rear of the home hosts a light-filled expansive sunroom with a multitude of uses depending on your needs and renovated laundry, all while offering access to the back garden.
Thoughtfully planned, the main backyard space is safe and secure with fencing and gates and offers an open grass area, impressive in-built children's playground and complete with a stunning mature fig tree offering dappled shade in the warmer months. This area is also equipped with a large free standing garage that has been transformed into the ultimate rumpus/gaming room with an open fire, which could easily be fully decked out and utilised as a bungalow set up.
Additional features include -
• Approx 1.66 acres
• Ducted heating
• Masport Wood fire
• Ceiling Fans
• Split system
• Rewired throughout
• Partially replumbed
• An array of fruit trees
• Dual access to the property both from Bellarine Highway and Kancy Street.
• An abundance of garaging and shedding, including a DLUG with rear access to the secure back yard attached to the house, separate front garage facing Bellarine Highway, 5 Bay garage at the rear of the property with access via Kancy Street and lockable garden sheds.
• An expansive and flat open paddock, perfect for a small hobby farm.
• Manicured and low maintenance front garden, offering established foliage and privacy.
These opportunities don't come along often and on offer is a tranquil lifestyle that is often sought yet rarely found. The Geelong CBD is only 10 minutes away and the ever-growing Leopold Gateway Plaza, schools, public transport and The Bellarine Peninsula at your fingertips. With enough space to roam and wander, yet still easily maintained, your imagine will run wild with the potential this fantastic property offers.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Private Nature Filled Sanctuary
For anyone dreaming of space to enjoy, this extensive property offers this and much more. With a generous home on 2.6 acres (approx), there is certainly enough room to spread out and you will feel a million miles away from it all.
This beautifully presented residence features light filled open plan living with a centrally placed kitchen and a meals area overlooking expansive lawns and tree filled gardens. Easy flow to north-facing outdoor living invites effortless entertaining on the hardwood deck or on the sheltered undercover patio. A second spacious sitting room and a study with bespoke built-in cabinetry are adjacent to a large master suite that boasts a recently refurbished en-suite. Three additional bedrooms, all with built-in robes, share a family sized bathroom. A third living zone provides a flexible space. Currently configured as a home gym it is also suitable as a media or playroom and could provide for overflow accommodation if required. Extra points of interest include double-glazing, ducted heating, evaporative cooling; gorgeous hardwood floors; and a double internal access garage.
Outside the features continue with a freestanding six-car garage that offers plentiful storage; there are two 20,000 litre rainwater tanks; vegetable plots; mature trees; and an olive grove.
Appreciated for its proximity to Geelong, Ocean Grove and the coast, this location is popular with families and anyone who loves peaceful, nature filled living. Welcome home to your own private sanctuary and immerse yourself in a special slice of country life.

Address: 73 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
A Beacon Of Shining Light!
Just when you thought it was the impossible dream; a stylish and uncompromising renovation of the highest calibre, x4 generous bedrooms, X2 bathrooms, a short walk to the water's edge and sweeping bay views AND all this at an entry level price point!
This charming and character filled residence is sure to impress!
Upon entry you will be greeted by towering cathedral ceilings, crisp neutral tones, the ambiance of a Coonara wood fire and expansive windows promote wonderful natural light
X4 bedrooms of grand proportions; master is complete with an epic custom built walk in robe and the luxurious ensuite is eye catching.
The primary living zone consists of a kitchen/family/meals area. The kitchen is brand new and is complete with expansive bench tops, excellent storage solutions, all new appliances and water views through the lush green tree tops.
Only being a short walk to the waters edge this home have been cleverly designed to embrace the wonderful Bellarine Peninsula lifestyle; generous off street parking is secured by an automated gate and provides room enough for the cars, boat, caravan and even the jet ski. An additional utility shed provides further conveniences.
The family/pet friendly yard is secured by a perimeter fence, tastefully landscaped and an expansive sheltered alfresco ensures this home is ticking all the boxes
All the modern comforts and many more fine features to be discovered on further inspection!

Opportunities like this often sought but hard to find.

Description:
'One With The Lot'
Perfectly positioned right in the heart of Drysdale is this contemporary residence boasting unrivalled size and scale! Towering high ceilings complement grand living proportions, expansive window features take full advantage of the northerly aspect, all the modern comforts and the enviable land holding of 762m2 (approx.) ensures this 'home' is simply one that offers it all!
Four beautifully appointed bedrooms plus a study; the master suite is oversized and complete with ensuite and walk in robe
Generous living areas are a fine feature of this home; the primary living zone comprises of a kitchen/family/dining area. The kitchen serves up a great space; expansive dual stone bench tops, 900mm gas cook top, feature tile splash back and a walk in pantry provides excellent storage solutions. The family zone is bathed in natural light courtesy of a wonderful northerly aspect; glass sliding door provides a seamless connection to the decked alfresco.
A second living area provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
The wide open spaces of the 762m2 (approx) land holding is further exaggerated by the neighbouring park lands; flanked by mature gum trees it delivers a tranquil outlook and the pleasant sounds of the native bird life.
All the modern comforts; ducted heating, evaporative cooling and an impressive inclusions list to be discovered upon inspection
Great lifestyle features; including a double remote controlled garage (internal access), dual rear access and additional off street parking
The A+++ location of this property can simply not be overstated; positioned right in the heart of Drysdale close to shops, schools, public transport and some of the most picturesque parklands.
The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; award winning wine labels, excellent boating and fishing prospects and the panoramic views of the bay.

Description:
Absolute Quality in Ideal Locale
With a stunning street appeal, a magnificent and spacious floorplan & situated on great allotment of 512m2 approx. this home offers potential for every buyer looking to secure their new home. Located in the heart of the Estuary Estate, conveniently located within walking distance to parks and sporting grounds, and only a short drive to the Gateway Shopping Centre, making this locale second to none.
Inside you are presented with 4 sizable bedrooms, a theatre room, 2 bathrooms and 2 separate living areas. The master suite, located at the front of the home, offers a private ensuite, as well as a generous walk in robe. The remaining three bedrooms all consisting of large built in robes and serviced by a central bathroom with a deep bath and separate toilet. The well-appointed gourmet kitchen, located in the hub of the home, overlooks both living and dining areas which is perfect for free-flowing family living. Featuring stone benchtops, 900mm stainless-steel cooktop, Bosch dishwasher, and a walk-in pantry for plenty of storage.
Open up through glass sliding doors and step out to the undercover alfresco area, perfect for all year-round use and entertaining. The spacious, yet private yard, makes for a fantastic space for family and friends to relax.
Added extras include 5kw solar system, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar water heating, landscaped gardens and a remote double lock up garage.
All your daily amenities are within a few kilometers such as the primary school, Gateway Plaza Shopping Centre and convenient access to Geelong CBD and the Bellarine Peninsula. A perfect opportunity in a desirable location. An inspection is a must!

Description:
Investment Opportunity in sought after location!
This impressive 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom unit is only 1 of 3 and is set in a quiet pocket of Leopold. Within walking distance or only 2 mins drive from some of Leopold's best amenities! Offering low-maintenance and convenient living with a fantastic tenant in place until February 2020 and hoping to stay long-term, astute investors will need to act swiftly to secure this perfect package!
Comprising of a neat entry with internal access to the deep single lock up garage, two good sized bedrooms, both with block out blinds and BIR's. The central bathroom offers a bath, corner shower and IXL heat lamps for those chilly mornings. There is also a separate toilet. The roomy functional laundry offers large built in storage cupboard and access to the rear outdoor area.
The wonderfully bright open plan kitchen/dining and spacious living area has both tiled and carpeted flooring, multiple windows with block out blinds and comes equipped with Sharp split system heating and cooling for all year-round comfort. The kitchen is equipped with Westinghouse 4 burner gas cooking, rangehood and oven, dishwasher, ample cupboard space and a large island bench with double sink. The dining area flows beautifully off the kitchen seating up to 6.
Off the living area are sliding doors opening into a beautiful, professionally landscaped private courtyard boasting a pergola, capital pear trees and a garden shed. With Gateway Plaza just a short walk away you'll find an array of shopping and dining options. Close to schools, 24-hour gym, sporting grounds, public transport and the Portarlington Highway allowing easy access to Geelong CBD and the scenic Bellarine Peninsula. You will need to act quickly to avoid disappointment!
FEATURES
1 of 3 Townhouses
Sharp split system heating and cooling
Rent: $300 - $320 approx per week
Rinnai Gas hot water
Deep single lock up garage
Walking distance to Gateway Plaza

Description:
Stunning, roomy and an amazing view!
This amazing 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 2 living zones home with drive through DLUG on 2 levels has everything a large or growing family would need and more. Sitting on a generous 683m2 and tucked away in a lovely quiet part of Leopold it will suit those looking for a larger family home on a good sized block set up for entertaining. Comprising 4 bedrooms, the main with ensuite and walk in robe are in the front portion of the home. Moving beyond this is a large open plan kitchen, dining and lounge. The kitchen is one of the larger ones you will encounter with plenty of cupboard and benchtop space, splash back and walk in pantry, 900ml gas cooktop and electric oven and dishwasher. With timber flooring in this area it is an ideal hub for the family. Concertina door separate the main living space and the Alfresco and when opened make an even bigger area for larger gatherings. Upstairs is a fantastic retreat with powder room and storage for games or equipment. This space also has access to the upstairs balcony with sweeping views of the Geelong area to the You Yangs. To the rear is a low maintenance garden and lawn area an ideal play area for young ones. Climate control is via split system air conditioning, central heating and ceiling fans. A large laundry with good bench and cupboard space, a drive through garage and 3x3 metre garden shed complete what is a really stunning package. Properties like this are extremely rare to the market. With all this lovely home has to offer it won't last so you will need to be quick to inspect!
683m2 block
Alfresco kitchen

Split system aircon and ceiling fans
Ideal for entertaining

Description:
A Spacious Family Home Surrounded by Landscaped Gardens
This ideally located, solid brick home is perfect for any growing family, first home buyer or investor alike. Within close walking distance of Dorothy Street shopping strip, as well as close proximity to the medical centre, schools, convenient public transport and only a 7-minute drive to Geelong CBD.
Nestled upon 847m2, the home is elevated and set back behind establish garden bed and offers a very private lifestyle. On entrance, be greeted by solid timber polished boards which flow into the formal lounge with split system cooling, gas heater and floor to ceiling windows overlooking the expansive gardens. Walking through from lounge to the formal dining room which steps out to the rear outdoor entertaining area.
The updated and contemporary kitchen comprises ample storage and bench space with new appliances including; electric cooking, dishwasher and dual sinks with low line benched and breakfast bar.
The home offers 4 generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes and solid timber floors. The main entertains a fully updated ensuite with toilet, vanity and shower.
The central bathroom, also updated, offers an abundance of space for the kids. Featuring bath, shower, vanity and plenty of under sink storage.
The real draw card for this home is without a doubt the rear landscaped yards, overflowing with various beds wrapped around a raised circular grass pad. It really is a beautiful treasure. Additional features include: water tank, double enclosed carport, plenty of off-street car parking, separate living zones, undercover alfresco area and garden shed.
This property offers a fantastic opportunity for today and years to come.
